about_the_game:
Play as Florence Phoenix, the last surviving astronaut of the Phoenix Initiative, on a post-apocalyptic Earth transformed into a desolate wasteland by the very technology meant to save it. Project Genesis's nanotech terraformers have run rampant, mutating life and creating hostile Crystal Beasts that roam the unforgiving landscape.

Embark on a desperate mission to reclaim Earth, where danger lurks around every corner and extreme weather conditions are constant threats. Scavenge for supplies, fend off vicious creatures and harness the energy of the Genesis Crystals, the unique artifacts that may hold the key to humanity's survival and the rebirth of the planet.

Build your colony and use your wits and combat skills to face formidable obstacles and challenges. With breathtaking top-down graphics and relentless gameplay, The Phoenix Initiative offers an intense and captivating experience that will keep you enthralled.

Are you ready to rise from the ashes and take on the mission to save humanity from extinction? The dawn of Earth's rebirth awaits. Play The Phoenix Initiative now and embrace your destiny!

Build your home
Build and defend your home in a world overrun by mutated humans! Strategically construct turrets, traps, and more to withstand waves of relentless attackers. With an extensive base-building system and dynamic enemy AI, no two battles will be alike. Can you survive the horde and protect what's yours?


Mine and gather resources
Embark on a journey through a post-apocalyptic world where resources are scarce and survival is key. Explore a randomly generated world and mine for valuable resources to take back to your base. Use these resources to build and upgrade your character, allowing you to face even greater challenges and become the ultimate survivor. With obstacles and enemies at every turn, can you gather enough resources to secure your future in this harsh world?


Dynamic Weather System
Embark on your perilous journey as you deal with unpredictable and dangerous weather conditions. Explore and face the challenges of dynamic weather events, from meteorite showers to toxic atmospheres. Stay alert and adapt to the changing environment to survive, but be warned – one wrong move could mean certain death.


Hard MODE ACTIVATED
Step into a brutal world where survival is a constant battle. Explore a dangerous earth filled with enemies waiting to take you down. With only a few hits until you're defeated, you'll need to be strategic in order to progress. This is a test of your skill and resilience, where every decision could mean the difference between life and death. Do you have what it takes to emerge victorious in this intense and unforgiving environment?


Character Development
With each level gained, you'll have the chance to enhance your skills and abilities with a choice of three unique upgrades. Will you choose to boost your combat prowess, improve your survival skills, or unlock powerful new abilities? The choice is yours but choose wisely - the fate of your journey rests in your hands. With procedurally generated levels and endless replayability, this game will keep you hooked for hours on end. So, what are you waiting for? Level up and discover your true potential in this epic roguelike adventure.

name: The Phoenix Initiative

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I5-8400 or AMD RYZEN 3 3300X
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB or AMD Radeon RX 570 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD (Preferred)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 11
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I7-8700K or AMD RYZEN 5 3600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1080Ti or AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD (Preferred)

short_description: Play as one of the last surviving humans on a post-apocalyptic Earth, where resources are scarce and danger lurks around every corner. As you scavenge for supplies, fend off vicious enemies, and build a small colony, you must use your wits and combat skills to survive in this harsh new world.
